title: Daughter of Darkness

find a way into the cloister
content:
es quest.

Your dialogue will be the following:

She's all yours Never.

Your choice here will affect your progress updates for this quest and Surrender Shadowheart to Viconia. If you surrender Shadowheart here, your quest will conclude and your final journal update will be the following:

We betrayed Shadowheart to Viconia in exchange for an alliance with the Sharrans in the fight against the Absolute.

Defeat Viconia and her followers.

We attempted to sway as many Shar worshippers as possible
